backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and perâ€‘principal backpack item management with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, and backpack initialization flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
Layout wrapper providing header, footer, background pattern, and authentication UI.
frontend/src/features/backpack/BackpackP: Main backpack page that loads user items, applies search and sort, and displays forms, lists, and panels within the app shell.
frontend/src/features/backpack/component: Shows an error card with the message and a retry button when backpack data fails to load.
Displays skeleton placeholders for the backpack page while data is loading.
Confirmation dialog that deletes an item using a mutation and shows success or error toasts.
Dialog for editing an existing item with validation and update mutation handling.
Help dialog containing instructions and accordion sections explaining how to use the digital backpack.
Form to create new backpack items with validation and create-item mutation.
Renders the list of items with empty and filtered states displayed in a card.
Single item row showing item info with edit and delete dialog controls.
Search and sort controls for backpack items using input and select UI components.
Displays total item count, quantity, and weight in three summary cards.
frontend/src/features/backpack/state/lis: Applies search filtering and sorting by name or quantity to a list of backpack items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login/logout handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, creating, updating, deleting, and initializing backpack items.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom warm-toned CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the Digital Backpack app, its features, image requirements, and pending backend feature requests.
